name: Office start page dark
description: Description This project is a dark version of Office start page website. How to contribute Go to GitHub, clone this project and start your changes. If you want to use styles from source code, then create new style in Stylish extension and put source code in opened window. How to use this style? You need Stylus extension installed on your browser to use this style. Disclaimer The author of this style rules isn't affiliated in any way with Microsoft, all the code is present "AS IS".
